Varnika collaborated with the [Kaczorowski Lab](https://kaczorowski.lab.medicine.umich.edu/) led by Postdoc fellow Yiding Cao on their paper "Uncovering hidden factors of cognitive resilience in Alzheimerâ€™s disease using a conditional-Gaussian mixture variational autoencoder", which was accepted into Nature's npj dementia journal.

You can read it [here](https://kaczorowski.lab.medicine.umich.edu/)!
